message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CL

This paper proposes a method to address the item cold-start problem in recommendation systems. It combines content-based and collaborative filtering approaches using the Wasserstein distance. Therefore, it is likely to belong to the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG), information retrieval (cs.IR), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), computer vision (cs.CV), and computational linguistics (cs.CL).
